inboundReferences.contextLine: Azure DevTest Labs is a tool to create and manage [[iaas]] (like [[azure-virtual-machines]]) and [[paas]] (like [[azure-app-service]]) instances for dev and test environments.
- [[azure-app-service]]: Web apps, API apps, WebJobs, Mobile Apps
It works with several PaaS services, such as [[azure-app-service]], [[Azure SQL]], and [[azure-storage-account]]. It watches for anomalies in the activity logs.
